author: jvanzyl
msg: o Update the project verifier to use the DefaultJarArtifact
o Checkstyle plugin is now self-contained
o Updating the jars.list and the project.xml to remove dependencies
that are now plugin dependencies.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Updating the plugin manager so that it now works with completely
self-contained JARs.
The checkstyle plugin is the first to work all from the JAR. The JARs
are pushed into the various classloaders using the meta info attached
to the dependency entries in the plugin's project.xml.
The rest of the plugins can be converted but the mechanism is working.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o The start of a mechanism whereby end users can customize the structure
of the local repository of artifacts. Currently I'm only using the
DefaultJarArtifact in the project verifier and the plugin manager. This
will be expanded shortly but will keep mvdb happy ;-)

author: werken
msg: The ANTLR plugin now works.  You'll see a bit of ANTLR complaining
about a SecurityException as maven blocks the call to System.exit(),
but it can be safely ignored.  Terence has been pinged.
